<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Halcamora (Lady of Ripe Bounty)](/Deities.aspx?ID=120)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Cultivate gardens, share wine, keep helpful insects, teach others to farm

**Anathema** Salt or despoil the earth, spread plague or pestilence, carelessly use pesticides

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, N

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Favored Weapon** [Club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2)

**Domains** [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=16), [Luck](/Domains.aspx?ID=18), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=53)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Summon Plant or Fungus](/Spells.aspx?ID=325)

- **2nd**
[Touch of Idiocy](/Spells.aspx?ID=341)

- **4th**
[Speak with Plants](/Spells.aspx?ID=294)

</column>
name: Halcamora (Lady of Ripe Bounty)
